About Me
  • Fan Hey there, I'm Xiaofan Shen. I graduated with a bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering from the University of Liverpool, and later switched gears to pursue a master's at UCL in Robotics and Computation. I have a deep passion for technology, and I particularly enjoy tinkering with Raspberry Pi to create fun and interesting projects.
